briefdescription.para: Stream insertion operator. Makes the display of a card on the terminal.

parameterdescription.para: The vector of cards to process.

briefdescription.para: Reads unsigned int between a minimum and a maximum values. Ask for user input.

simplesect.para: A unsigned int between the parameters set.

briefdescription.para: Reads int between a minimum and a maximum values. Ask for user input.

simplesect.para: The int between the parameters set.

briefdescription.para: Reads unsigned int. Asks for user input.
Reads a int value. Asks for user input.

simplesect.para: The int inserted by the user.

briefdescription.para: Reads a 0 or a 1 from user input.
Reads a float from user input.

simplesect.para: The float inputed by the user.
The character inserted by the user: "y" or "n".

briefdescription.para: Reads and parses the users file to usersVec.
Checks if the file with name filetxt_temp exists.

simplesect.para: True if it exists, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Performs a binary search of id in VEC.

simplesect.para: The index of id in Vec, or -1 if id was not found.

memberdef.argsstring: (vector< int > &usersVEC, int &user, pair< int, int > xy, int &save)
memberdef.name: saveChanges

briefdescription.para: Asks user to save the current status when exiting.

parameterdescription.para: Pair with horizontal and vertical lengths of the terminal.
Boolean that holds user option to save or not the changes made.

briefdescription.para: Ask user to input a file name.

parameterdescription.para: A string that will be updated with the user input.
